article:
You can't take it back, can't buy it, borrow it or use someone else's. You either have total   _   or it is gone. Each one of us on this earth has the same   _   to start with, to use or to   throw away  . Do you know what it is ?
It is time. But are you really using your time  _   or are you just letting it escape through your fingers like   _    through your toes as you walk along the beach?
I have a friend who always    _    about not having enough time to start a new business . But why doesn't he have time? Is it because he spends too much time at work or he is toally involved in   _   activities when he gets home? I could   _    completely why he has no available time to pursue even the planning of a new   _   if this was the case. But    _  , none of this is true.
This is a man who does not spend hours at home participating in all kinds of activities.   _   , this is a man who comes home every evening to eat and then to sit in front of the Tv for the rest of the evening. He spends his weekends doing nothing but   _   Tv or visit with friends. Do you think he has time available?
He has the time available if he choose to   _   it. However, he chooses to waste it. Does he have a strong   _   to actually start planning and taking action to begin a new business? No. And , with his current  _  , do you think he could actually make a success of his business?   _  . Why? Put simply, it is because running your own business takes a great deal of effort and a huge amount of   _  .
Time is not your enemy; passion and perseverance are   _   for success. If you want life to roll by without   _   anything you want, simply keep   _    your time. You will never get it back.
